revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Whirl Islands |image = [[File:Whirl Islands.png|thumb]] |caption = An inside view of Whirl Islands. |tokens = 5,000 |location = On Route 41, south of Olivine City. }} '''Whirl Islands''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 92,800 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Seel.png|40px]] Seel |- | [[File:Krabby.png|40px]] Krabby |- | [[File:Horsea.png|40px]] Horsea |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Dewgong.png|40px]] Dewgong || rowspan=2|<center>400,000 || rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Kingler.png|40px]] Kingler |- | [[File:Lugia.png|40px]] Lugia || <center>1,410,000 |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
